thread.title: Megan Fox Models Lingerie, Announces She's Launching a 'Personal Collection'
thread.title_full: Megan Fox Models Lingerie, Announces She's Launching a 'Personal Collection'

author: Jackie Willis
title: Megan Fox Models Lingerie, Announces She's Launching a 'Personal Collection'
text: Megan Fox Models Lingerie, Announces She's Launching a 'Personal Collection' by Jackie Willis 7:46 AM PDT, March 14, 2017 Photo: Instagram Megan Fox is all decked out in satin, lace and leather. On Monday, the 30-year-old actress shared a photo from her Frederick's of Hollywood lingerie campaign, which featured her posing in a purple bra, matching underwear and a garter belt. "My @fredericks_hollywood campaign has launched," she captioned the sexy image. "Stay tuned for more including my personal collection coming holiday 2017." WATCH: Megan Fox Shades Will Arnett for Bringing His Younger Girlfriends on Ninja Turtles Set In addition to being the new face of Frederick's, Fox was named brand ambassador, stakeholder, and creative partner of the company in September. "My definition of beauty is simplicity, elegance, and sensuality," Fox said of her lingerie style. "I think that when a woman is in harmony with herself and remains true to her values, she will glow naturally." A post shared by Megan Fox (@the_native_tiger) on Mar 13, 2017 at 3:40pm PDT Photo: Instagram Frederick's of Hollywood also shared a commercial of the mother of three in a number of seriously sexy teddies and lingerie pieces. The Transformers star does have some experience with underwear campaigns. In 2010, she and soccer pro Cristiano Ronaldo modeled Emporio Armani undergarments in a series of scantily-clad ads. When Fox isn't modeling, acting or helping run a lingerie company, she's hanging with husband Brian Austin Green and their children. Last November, Green shared some rare photos of his wife and their sons. Check them out: RELATED SLIDESHOW
